p: For newly diagnosed HIV-infected patients, 2 mL of venous blood samples were obtained from each patient to measure T cell subsets, with all analysis completed within 4 h of sampling. Flow cytometric acquisition and analysis was performed using a FACSCan II flow cytometer (BD Biosciences, San Jose, CA). Absolute numbers of each lymphocyte subset were determined using CD3/CD4/CD8/CD45 BD Multitest reagents according to the manufacturerâ€™s protocols (BD Biosciences).
